title: AI Story Generator
description: Single-page web app that generates a story based on user prompt using AI

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: User inputs prompt and selects story type

pages.name: Story Preview
pages.purpose: Displays generated story preview with options to share or generate new story

state.name: initial
state.description: App initializes with blank prompt and story type

state.name: prompt_set
state.description: Prompt is set by user, generate story button becomes active

state.name: story_generated
state.description: Story is generated, preview container displays result

interactions.name: set_prompt
interactions.description: User inputs prompt into text input field

interactions.name: select_story_type
interactions.description: User selects story type from dropdown menu

interactions.name: generate_story
interactions.description: Generate button clicked, AI generates story based on user input and story type

acceptance_criteria.name: AC1
acceptance_criteria.description: User can input prompt into text input field

acceptance_criteria.name: AC2
acceptance_criteria.description: App displays generated story preview after button click

acceptance_criteria.name: AC3
acceptance_criteria.description: User can share generated story via social media or email
